title: Cross-Tenant Link Component
description: Manages a link to a Thread in another tenant, enabling federated relationships.

remote_tenant_id.description: The ID of the tenant where the linked Thread resides.

remote_thread_id.description: The ID of the Thread in the remote tenant.

link_status.description: The status of the cross-tenant link.

permissions_granted.description: A list of permissions granted by the remote user for this link.
